glsa.title: PAM S/Key: Information disclosure
glsa.synopsis: PAM S/Key does not clear provided credentials from memory, allowing local attackers to gain access to cleartext credentials.

background.p: PAM S/Key is a pluggable authentication module for the OpenBSD Single-key Password system.

description.p: Ulrich MÃ¼ller reported that a Gentoo patch to PAM S/Key does not remove credentials provided by the user from memory.

impact.p: A local attacker with privileged access could inspect a memory dump to gain access to cleartext credentials provided by users.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
